Changeset.Change: Included declarations for OAI-PMH caches in ehcache configuration file
Added methods in DigitalObject class for keeping the name of the collection to which the digital object belongs
Added session constants
Added new ehcache declaration
Identify OpenSearch indices when retrieving information for the collections
Added OpenSearch query template information for every collection
Added methods to interact with new CM for content retrieval
Added collections cache manager - that periodically refreshes collections
Added methods for interaction with new CM
Removed caching of content in local disk for new cm
Refactored with new CM
Provide more information for Collections. Extended api
Extended DigitalObject and ResultSetConsumer api to satisfy more cases
Added Java property to settings.properties file
Extended API to provide functionality for Data Transformation
Extended API to provide functionality for OCR
Added functionality to handle all types of gcube content elements (alternatives, metadata, parts, etc.)
Added functionality to handle non cms uris
Ehcache version is updated
Bug fixes
Started the integration with the Tree Manager
